column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/a59db19ee3b454680b3bb0aa881e601b9311a9ae for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Do you plan on eventually implementing full BIP 32 support into Bitcoin-QT?\n
ACK.  On the basis that this has already been used to validate other implementations and has even turned up some bugs, I think it would be good to include this.\n
